text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering | 93% | stars now 2961 → est 8343 (range 8318-8368)
   https://github.com/muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering
2) bellard/mquickjs | 93% | stars now 4048 → est 14304 (range 14269-14339)
   https://github.com/bellard/mquickjs
3) Maxteabag/sqlit | 89% | stars now 2115 → est 3594 (range 3564-3624)
   https://github.com/Maxteabag/sqlit
4) QwenLM/Qwen-Image-Layered | 87% | stars now 996 → est 2153 (range 2128-2178)
   https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen-Image-Layered
5) antonmedv/textarea | 87% | stars now 613 → est 2273 (range 2248-2298)
   https://github.com/antonmedv/textarea

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
